author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
description:
Provides values based on picked object instances.  
Useful for camera tracking, flocking behaviors, and more.

Included expressions

Center points:
- X center point (absolute) 
- Y center point (absolute)
- X center point (average) 
- Y center point (average)

Position expressions (based on AABB of objects):
- Minimum X position
- Minimum Y position
- Maximum X position
- Maximum Y position

Force expressions:
- Average horizontal force (X)
- Average vertical force (Y)

Angle expressions:
- Average angle of rotation

Size expressions:
- Width (min/max/average)
- Height (min/max/average)
name: ValuesOfMultipleObjects
shortDescription: Values of picked object instances (including position, size, force and angle).

eventsFunctions.description: Minimum X position of picked object instances (using AABB of objects).
eventsFunctions.fullName: Minimum X position of picked object instances

events.comment: Return the midpoint between the min and max values

parameters.longDescription: Objects that will be used to calculate their center point

eventsFunctions.description: X center point (average) of picked object instances.
eventsFunctions.fullName: X center point (average) of picked object instances
eventsFunctions.name: AverageCenterOfObjectsX

events.comment: Reset counter variables
Cycle through units and calculate a sum of their position value
Prevent dividing by 0
Divide the the sum of positions by the number of objects to get the average position

eventsFunctions.description: Average angle of rotation of picked object instances.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Average angle of rotation of picked object instances
eventsFunctions.name: AverageAngle

events.comment: Reset counter variables
Cycle through units and calculate average angle
Use negative values for angles between 180 and 360
Prevent dividing by 0
Divide the the sum of positions by the number of objects to get the average position
